title: Collaborative Learning Course Through Social Constructivism and xMOOC Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of MOOC platforms and experience in utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening Collaborative Competencies Through Social Learning Activities for Professionals in Healthcare, Legal, and Technical Fields

learning_goals: Learners can plan social constructivist-based learning activities by applying xMOOC design principles
Learners can improve learning content by exchanging peer feedback using collaborative tools (online forums, document-sharing systems, etc.)
Learners can design and present collaborative learning models applicable to real work environments through project-based assessments

resources: Online collaboration platforms (e.g., Notion, Google Workspace)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
